name: Disassembly VR
description: Love taking things apart? Seeing how things work? Destroying stuff? Shooting stuff with a shotgun or rocket launcher? This game lets you do so in the ultimate destruction experience! Disassembly VR: Ultimate Reality Destruction simulates the experience of taking everyday objects apart in virtual reality.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: VR headset required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: VR headset required
